has introduced the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/aseGCF\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Advanced Software Engineering (ASE)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"career path to help our best engineers become true T-shaped experts, hands-on creators and problem solvers, while they advance as solution thinkers and technology consultants. This path is intended to enable talented engineers to build credentials and seniority from Junior through \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Distinguished Engineer \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(an equivalent of a Senior Director in EPAM), while staying hands-on and deep into subject matter, as well as to recognize our people with advanced engineering capabilities that do not always want to progress through management ranks. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Advanced Software Engineering is built around cross-stack engineering and systems of different complexity based on different cutting-edge technologies.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":522194,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/80610d20-4183-4a29-9e22-6c16766ebc92/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/80610d20-4183-4a29-9e22-6c16766ebc92/Picture2.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture2.png\",\"name\":\"Picture2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"80610d20-4183-4a29-9e22-6c16766ebc92\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":646,\"height\":542},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://kb.epam.com/download/attachments/1148247257/Picture1.png?version=1&modificationDate=1600773453223&api=v2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":646,\"height\":542}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the same time, ASE is about building a network of EPAM’s best engineers as they take the next step in developing EPAM’s engineering DNA. So, joining us, we expect you to propagate High Engineering Culture, bring emerging technologies in the sphere of influence, contribute to EPAM image both for our clients and for our Engineers being a role model.  If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us by emailing \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:AskAdvEng@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AskAdvEng@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Advanced Engineering is the bright future for EPAM’s engineering DNA – join us on the journey to spread it!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
